description.value:
The shallows and tide pools have always called to you and let you pass unhindered. You ignore difficult terrain resulting from shallow water.

In addition, if you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Balance] on a slippery or wet surface, or on an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Swim], you get a critical success instead.
